summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 54317 relating to and providing for the purchase of Lot 2, Block 11, of the plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, as laid out on the Claims of C. D. Boren and A. A. Denny, as an addition and betterment to and extension of the municipal light and power plant and system, for a substation site, and making an appropriation therefor.
